mapper.select: insert into INSEQuote (id,operator,createtime,modifytime, vincode,engineno, standardfullname, cifstandardname, carprice,registerdate,startdate, enddate, amount,origialwarrantyperiod,plateNumber,extendwarrantytype) values (#{id},#{operator},#{createtime},#{modifytime}, #{vincode},#{engineno},#{standardfullname},#{cifstandardname},#{carprice},#{registerdate},#{startdate},#{enddate},#{amount},#{origialwarrantyperiod},#{plateNumber},#{extendwarrantytype})
